actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1257 of title 28, United States Code, to provide that the Supreme Court shall not have jurisdiction to review a State court final judgment or decree that an act or publication is obscene.

summary.text: Provides that the U.S. Supreme Court shall not have jurisdiction to review a State court final judgment or decree that an act or publication is obscene. (Amends 28 U.S.C. 1257)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1257 of title 28, United States Code, to provide that the Supreme Court shall not have jurisdiction to review a State court final judgment or decree that an act or publication is obscene.
